title: [Bug/HELP] Unresponsive Abilities (Vi/XinZhao)
body:
Hey,

 I recently got back into LoL and I've noticed a bug. I've run a repair and re installed my game yet this still persists.

On Vi {{champion:254}} , sometimes my Flash  just refuses to work.. until like the 8th click of the button. Same with my Smite.
Also, Vi's Q does the same, I have to press it various times before it works, It just shows the charge up arrow at the lowest length.

I know this isn't a keyboard issue because the ability makes a click sound and stuff, though doesn't go off. I also know it isn't a lag or latency issue, players still move normally and so can I.

Also, I noticed this happening with Smite on Xin Zhao {{champion:5}}  sometimes, but less often.

Has anybody come across this before? Will this be patched?

replies.body: >**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
